body:

Thank you to all the booksellers who are championing this release by opening their doors to little olâ€™ me.

These arenâ€™t the only events Iâ€™ll be doing this year - thereâ€™ll be many more festivals and events to come.

And if youâ€™re based on the US East Coast keep an eye out in the coming weeks...

Tickets are limited and selling fast. Visit the Events page for ticket links!

title: Test news B
excerpt: The Cursebound UK tour is HERE! Grab your tickets for London, Manchester, and Edinburgh stops. Limited availability â€” don't miss out on meeting Saara and getting your books signed!
body:
The Cursebound UK tour is officially happening, and tickets are now available!

## Tour Dates

- **London** - February 15, 2025 at Waterstones Piccadilly
- **Manchester** - February 22, 2025 at Waterstones Deansgate
- **Edinburgh** - March 1, 2025 at Waterstones West End

Each event will include:

- Book signing
- Q&A session
- Exclusive behind-the-scenes stories about the Faebound series
- Photo opportunities

Tickets are limited and selling fast. Visit the [Events page](/events.html) for ticket links!

See you on tour! ğŸ’œâœ¨
